desc: Bringing together global authorities on strategic sales techniques and combining them with insights from leading businesses & professionals, welcome to Artesian?s  Connections 15.  Just what you need to get ahead and stay on top of your game. As the  only  B2B event to specifically target you, the sales professional,  Connections 15  not only addresses the challenges of sales today, it gives you the tools you need to succeed now and tomorrow. With three different streams customised to your experience and area of expertise, reserve your place today to maximise the sales opportunities for you and your team. ? Change the way you sell.
